attributes.action: Stop the Jobcentres using 0845, 0870 or 090 number
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All the Job Centres are turning there numbers to 0845 or other high rate chagres. They only pay out a very little amouth to live on and with these high call cost, People are struggling to live and pay there bills. We would like all Job Centres phones numbers to become an 01,02 or FREE phone numbers to call.
People whom need to contact there Local deliver office about changes cant because of the high chages or because of line restrictions or credit rating.
